item.title: Find Relationships Quickly In Data With Chart::Plot
item.description: Last week I was analyzing server log data at work, and my boss asked me to plot it on a scatter chart. “No problem!” I thought, firing up Google Sheets. But Sheets slowed to a crawl when I uploaded 250,000 records to plot. Using CPAN I found something better: Chart::Plot. It has a simple interface and is really fast. Here’s how you use it. A scatter plot script #!/usr/bin/env perl use Chart::Plot; open my $mlb, '<', '2017-so-hr.
